content: I have been looking into servers that could be used for production. I see lot of test servers. For Eg. HAPI and others. I see vonk that is production quality. Are there other servers that could be used for production.

that depends on what you mean by 'production quality'. At least the following general purpose servers have lots of production use already:
- HAPI
- AidBox
- Vonk

There are lots of others built piecemeal from the parts of those that are open source too
Hello all.. can someone please tell me, while implementing Smart on Fhir apps, do we need to hide fhir server ISS, url when passing in the launch url.
Not 100% sure what you mean, but no - you should not have to hide anything
